website_summaries.verdict: With a classic look, the Vans ComfyCush Authentic is here to satisfy the brand’s loyal followers. It is equipped with the ComfyCush technology that delivers supreme cushioning for all-day comfort. If you are looking for a kick that can give comfort even for long-time use, the ComfyCush Authentic can fit the bill.Like other Vans Authentic sneakers, this shoe also offers a straightforward yet eye-appealing silhouette that can complement several outfits. It also gives the lightweight feels. Try to add this to your rotation of kicks without breaking your wallet.
pros: The Vans ComfyCush Authentic is a comfortable sneaker that you can wear all day, according to a significant number of buyers
Several customers appreciate the shoe’s classic yet fashionable design
It is among the versatile Vans sneakers that are a perfect match for everyday wear, as per many wearers
Several users have shared that they love the fact that the low-top Vans ComfyCush Authentic is a lightweight sneaker
This iteration of the Vans Authentic offers sufficient arch support, according to a few reviewers
Some express their appreciation of the shoe’s classic look
Most of the shoppers say that they highly recommend the Vans ComfyCush Authentic to others
The ComfyCush feature is better than the UltraLite, one has mentioned
A couple of purchasers declare that it is a durable shoe
The ComfyCush Authentic from Vans is up for grabs at an affordable price tag
cons: Because of the shoe’s pointy toe construction, it causes a narrow fit that several purchasers have complained about
The heel counter is too roomy that let the heel slips out when walking, according to a couple of users
A couple of wearers have muttered against the stiff ankle collar, causing blisters on the heel

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not for my feet.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these shoes because there is not enough thick sole between my whiny feet and the floor. This is, however, my particular problem. If you do not need lots of padding, these shoes are really cute and useful. They do have a thicker sole than some other similar brands. Since they are gender-neutral, they run a little wider than women's shoes. I would have loved to have been able to keep them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Herrin

customer_reviews.title: Different than the pro skates from 1-2 years ago
customer_reviews.text: Different construction on canvas portion of the shoes than my pro skates from a few years ago. Fit approximately the same, but these had significantly thinner canvas material and probably won't stand up to the abuse of my previous ones.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall H.

customer_reviews.title: It fits perfectly and I got it for a great deal. Happy Son = Happy Mom
customer_reviews.text: My 15 year old son is a fan of Vans and had already owned a pair. He loves them and wears them all the time. It fits perfectly and I got it for a great deal. Happy Son = Happy Mom. :)
customer_reviews.author: GonzalesFamily

customer_reviews.title: ... i still gave them five stars because they looked awesome and were the exact ones i wanted
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered the wrong size so i had to return them but i still gave them five stars because they looked awesome and were the exact ones i wanted. it was my fault for not noticing the size.
customer_reviews.author: Yari

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: They were a gift for someone. I didn't hear any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Meyers

customer_reviews.title: These are good, basic Vans
customer_reviews.text: These are good, basic Vans. They arrived exactly when they were expected to. They fit just right. The order was placed in men's size.
customer_reviews.author: mandycambry

customer_reviews.title: My son will only wear Van's
customer_reviews.text: We love Vans....This was too small, my fault...return is going very smoothly...
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love these all blacks. Had the white and black pros and wore them out.
customer_reviews.author: AsianSensation

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wear these for running around to clients all day and they never cause any issues.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fields

customer_reviews.title: They're Vans
customer_reviews.text: They're Vans so of course they're awesome. Only issue I have is the inside of the tongue has a tag that will wear the crap out of the top of your foot till it's broken in. They look and fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: wrong size-- need to define or make clear the size chart---separate women from men
customer_reviews.author: OLLL

customer_reviews.title: Look and feel great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit - speedy shipping - they look and feel great !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As always, very comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Probably 50th pair I have had, and as usual they fit awesome. Great vendor, shipped quick, received exactly what I ordered and at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: S. Davis

customer_reviews.text: I have bought the same exact pair of vans for 3 years now and have never had a problem until this pair. They fit perfectly, but on the top of my foot they rub!!! Its the under part of where the laces go. I've never had a pair do this before! Makes it very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: jessica mares

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Be sure if you want a woman's size, you make the size adjustment from men's. For example women's 8 is a men's 6.5. I didn't the first time and had to exchange them. Other than that, I LOVE these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Lola Andrus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits well. The sole is not red as pictured. but other than that i can dig it.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Rodrigo

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I received he regular authentic instead of the authentic pro... I still kept them but just be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Albizu

customer_reviews.title: Did not say if it was men's or women's and ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not say if it was men's or women's and it is for men's so it was way to large. I could exchange so I had to do refund and reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Candi Dersch

customer_reviews.title: My Sons Love These
customer_reviews.text: As for arch support, I can't really say. These were purchased for my son, he's not here right now. He uses these for gymnastic dance programs our school puts on, all the boys wear them. They double as school shoes as well. My boys figured out a way to waterproof them for rain. They shred crayon over them and use hair dryer. Both boys are very happy with result.
customer_reviews.author: Palyadasi108

customer_reviews.title: Shoe was excelente, but I bought the wrong size ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was excelente , but I bought the wrong size.
customer_reviews.author: Zulangel Chernes

customer_reviews.title: Vans shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought the shoes for my son for Christmas . Its exactly what he wanted. They fit great. Am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Denny

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It said they were the same size but my right one felt bigger than the other one
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shoes I got were exactly as expected love them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the right foot, I guess
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong except they're just too small. They look like chick shoes on me. I'm too lazy to return them.
customer_reviews.author: CW83186

customer_reviews.title: ... the fabric from the picture here but its a pretty flimsy and cheap looking material
customer_reviews.text: its hard to make out the texture of the fabric from the picture here but its a pretty flimsy and cheap looking material. there hasnt been any damage to the shoe at all yet (after maybe 10 days of everyday wearing) but I was hoping for something a bit more luxurious and in line with what I've had over the years from vans...
customer_reviews.author: Owen Joyce-Coughlan

customer_reviews.title: Was disappointed that the necklace did come in the red box ...
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed that the necklace did come in the red box as pictured on information page,,
customer_reviews.author: william webb

product_meta.title: Vans Ua Comfycush Authe (Classic), 6, Medium Trainers
product_meta.description: Simple, stylish and effective: made from a laced layered model.
feature_bullets: With roots firmly anchored in So.Cal surf and skate style, but are hugged all over the world, you will stay true to the clean, classic and uncompromising aesthetics of the Vans ComfCush Authentic shoe.
